item.title: EP 961 - The Man In The Closet
item.itunes:title: The Man In The Closet
item.description:
Today we investigate whether the song “Fireflies” is cursed or blessed, and then we may be one step closer to figuring out who is the ghost in my closet!

 

Fan Art Friday Art by Cabot Cove Balloon Friends (RIP Angela Lansbury)
